dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4651 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 West Baker Road in Baytown, Texas, as the “Specialist Keith Erin Grace, Jr. Memorial Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stockman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 West Baker Road in Baytown, Texas, as the Specialist Keith Erin Grace, Jr. Memorial Post Office.

section.header: Specialist Keith Erin Grace, Jr. Memorial Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 601 West Baker Road in Baytown, Texas, shall be known as the Specialist Keith Erin Grace, Jr. Memorial Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referenced to subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Specialist Keith Erin Grace, Jr. Memorial Post Office.
